experience.description: Created model to detect names to prevent sanctioned individuals and companies from using clients banking services ‚Ä¢ Designed Natural Language Processing model using Phonetic Algorithms including Soundex, Double Metaphone, and NYSIIS ‚Ä¢ Developed threshold-based scoring framework using string metrics like Levinstine, Jaro wrinkler, and Cosine Similarity ‚Ä¢ Reduced false positives by 5% by implementing classification model and performing exploratory data analysis on Ofac list‚Ä¢ Decreased Running time by 40 mins by brainstorming optimization strategies including categorization and extracting tools

positions.subtitle: AIESEC
positions.description: -Delivered 6 Approvals raising an amount of INR 111,000 with a growth of 400% percent compared to last year's Winter Exchange.-Awarded as best team member for bringing highest exchanges in a team of 15 members.-Played an important role in the organization to clear its debt to AIESEC in India.
positions.title: Marketing Team Member
positions.description_html:
-Delivered 6 Approvals raising an amount of INR 111,000 with a growth of 400% percent compared to last year's Winter Exchange.
-Awarded as best team member for bringing highest exchanges in a team of 15 members.
-Played an important role in the organization to clear its debt to AIESEC in India.

positions.subtitle: AIESEC
positions.description: YouthSpeak Forum is the flagship event of AIESEC in IIT Kharagpur which is aimed at bringing together both young and senior leaders to form a diverse cross-sector and multi-generational space for inspiring conversations around pressing global issues.-Part of the 3-member team involved in complete planning, organizing and the delivery of the event.-Oversaw the complete sponsorship and finances related to the logistics, venue, etc. of the event.-Delivered an event with 4 amazing speakers (Including CEO of keventers, Youtube Actor Ankush Bahuguna and Australian motivational Speaker Liza Pavlakos), and overall participation of 500+ students from  IIT Kharagpur, Kolkata, Ranchi.Raised total sponsorship of INR 90,000 worked and managed a team of 7 members.-Responsible for the complete value delivery of each sponsor.-The event drew the attention of the Dean of Students' Affairs, IIT Kharagpur and some local newspapers.
positions.title: Core Committee Member
positions.description_html:
YouthSpeak Forum is the flagship event of AIESEC in IIT Kharagpur which is aimed at bringing together both young and senior leaders to form a diverse cross-sector and multi-generational space for inspiring conversations around pressing global issues.
-Part of the 3-member team involved in complete planning, organizing and the delivery of the event.
-Oversaw the complete sponsorship and finances related to the logistics, venue, etc. of the event.
-Delivered an event with 4 amazing speakers (Including CEO of keventers, Youtube Actor Ankush Bahuguna and Australian motivational Speaker Liza Pavlakos), and overall participation of 500+ students from IIT Kharagpur, Kolkata, Ranchi.
Raised total sponsorship of INR 90,000 worked and managed a team of 7 members.
-Responsible for the complete value delivery of each sponsor.
-The event drew the attention of the Dean of Students' Affairs, IIT Kharagpur and some local newspapers.

          Global Volunteer is an international student exchange program aimed towards contributing to United Nations' 2030 Goal for Sustainable Development and develop peaceful diplomatic relations between countries.-Worked with a team of 9 interns in Dalian, China-Contributed towards creating an English language literacy framework for China-Planned and delivered sessions and workshops on English language awareness and speaking clubs that saw participation of over 100 students-Developed cross-cultural understanding by hosting seminars and meets on Indian culture, learnt working proficiency Mandarian languageKey learnings: Adapting to New Environments & Diverse Teams, Solution-Oriented, Self-Aware, Mandarian Language, Breaking Stereotypes, Dealing with Students, Teaching
